Hi Nidhi,

We have made some updates. We have cleared the site and server cache.
Can you please try now?

Hi Nidhi,

We are looking into this, we will update you shortly :)

Hi Joel ,

We 're having several issues with our website since the update :

Header : Our drop down functions have stopped working

Home Page : Alignment of pages, the pages that have the slides function are mis-configured could you possibly resolve this ,

Pricing page : Same as above

Resources Page : Could you try to configure it to its previous setting , all the resource seem to be missing (again slide functions)





Kind Regards,

Hi Nidhi,

We’ve updated the Case Study page layout to ensure compatibility with the filters.

You can view the changes here:
https://duracube.com.au/inspiration/case-study/

The previous layout was not fully compatible with the filtering functionality, so we’ve made adjustments to align both the design and the filtering behavior.

Hi Joel, The link you sent is for an old page. However, we would like the new page to have a layout and segmentation that match the one you just shared.

It looks like you've already made some progress, which is exactly what we needed. The new page will be at https://duracube.com.au/case-study/.
Let me know if that clears things up and if I can help in any other way .
Kind Regards,

Nidhi Toppo
Marketing Assistant





13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750



1300 387 228



DuraCube

full_threads.body:
Hi ,
I was just wondering if you could assist us with any of the following updates :

1. Architect Login:
Could we make this more prominent to clearly indicate the presence of a login? Perhaps replace the current arrow with text for better clarity.

2. Case Studies:
We'd like to bring back the industry filter on the main Case Studies page. Once completed , could you ensure all case studies are correctly assigned to the appropriate categories? Currently, some are miscategorised.

3. Pricing
Partitioning Systems:Under this section, the following prices are missing. Please include:
  • Pedestal Mount - Overhead Braced (POB)
  • Pedestal Mount - Ceiling Fixed (PCF)
Also, under the Lockers section, the following options are missing:
  • Lockers - Plinth Mounted (LPM)
  • Lockers - Wall Mounted (LWM)

Please let me know if this is something you can help us with , happy to share any information as required.
Kind Regards,
Nidhi Toppo
Marketing Assistant
13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750
1300 387 228
DuraCube
DuraCube
